imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Vibrant community platform hero banner with diverse people connecting and sharing, using warm coral and teal color scheme with friendly illustrated style (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Simple friendly community icon showing people gathering in a circular formation, warm colors, minimalist style (community-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a user profile system where community members can view and edit their own profiles with username, bio, and avatar
Implement a post creation and feed system where users can create text posts and view a chronological feed of all community posts
Add interaction features allowing users to like posts and view like counts
Create a commenting system where users can add comments to posts and view all comments on each post

Design a vibrant, modern community-focused interface with a warm color palette (coral, teal, amber accents), friendly rounded typography, and card-based layouts that encourage social interaction and content discovery
Display generated community platform images including a hero banner and community icon as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
